room_title: Escape room "Tomb of Anubis" by 13th Gate Escape in Baton Rouge
review: I've done the Collector and Tomb of Anubis and absolutely loved both of them. The staff is so friendly and both rooms we did felt so real. The attention to detail is amazing. The puzzles were so fun and kept us entertained the entire time! Can't wait to go back and try more rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Tomb of Anubis" by 13th Gate Escape in Baton Rouge
review: All I can say is WOW! We did the Tomb of Anubis and were totally blown away with the level of detail that went into it. The puzzles were challenging and we finished with only 2 minutes to spare. HIGHLY recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Tomb of Anubis" by 13th Gate Escape in Baton Rouge
review: Awesome experience! They do a great job at really making you feel like you are in the environment of the room you choose. We did Tomb of Anubis and have to go back so we can finish! It was tough, but so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Tomb of Anubis" by 13th Gate Escape in Baton Rouge
review: Great puzzles and ambiance. Felt like being in a saw movie. Would highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Tomb of Anubis" by 13th Gate Escape in Baton Rouge
review: This was by far one of the most unique and fantastic experiences I've had. We went through the collector room and everything was so well thought out and creative. The puzzles were clever and challenging and the aesthetics alone were beautifully gory and well placed. Two of us went and were skeptical about the randoms, but the necessity for teamwork makes you all besties by the end. We escaped and has so much fun doing so! We will DEFINITELY be back for more adventure!!
